title: Genesis in the Hills
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Western, Mediterranean, Australian, BYOB
description: Located in the Perth hills, near Araluen Botanic Park. Serves seasonal vegetarian food with changing specials plus soups, veggieburger, open sandwich with grilled vegetable, house platter, quinoa salad, coffee, tea, and cakes. Almond, rice, and soy milk available for hot drinks and smoothies. Open for breakfast Fri-Sun; morning tea, lunch, and afternoon tea Thur-Sun. Hosts monthly art exhibitions and frequent events.
